website_summaries.verdict: An outstanding drone if you're in the market for a folding, portable unit that can take 4K video.
pros: It features the stable flight, excellent photo/video system, and obstacle detection of the Phantom 4 Pro in a portable package
cons: The wind blows this little unit around more than larger DJI models and that can interfere with photos and smooth video capabilities

customer_reviews.title: DJI Care Refresh issues? No worries!
customer_reviews.text: The UAS works flawlessly, with no scratches or dings or missing pieces. I had an issue with purchasing DJI Care Refresh for my refurbished Mavic Pro after delivery. A quick email to DJI Support through their webform allowed me to attach screen shots of my purchase and delivery date. Within 24 hours the issue had been fully resolved. Ideally there wouldn't be any issues that require customer time, but for an extra 5 minutes of my time I was able to save $200 over purchasing a brand new Mavic Pro. The savings pay for the DJI Care Refresh and leaves $100 on the table to purchase the "Platinum" blades and an extra battery or other accessories.
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE MY DRONE
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE MY DRONE!!! If you are even considering getting a drone, just do it. You will not regret it. But make sure it is a DJI product. Easy to fly. Comes back to you if it loses signal. Let go of the controls and it hovers in place. This is my second DJI drone and when i can afford it I will get another. Refurb is a great way to go. Everything is like new. Boxed and comes with everything just like new. CAN'T BEAT DJI.
customer_reviews.author: IfItflys

customer_reviews.title: Amazing little drone
customer_reviews.text: Amazing little drone, this is. It says refurbished but you’d never tell from original packaging and box and manuals, to plastic still left on various pieces to protect it against scratching. Only issue with buying refurbished is that it appears this isn’t eligible for DJI Care Refresh which is a year warranty on the drone. It keeps giving me errors when I try to do it (has to be done in first 48 hours of use). So far it’s one of the best drones I’ve ever used. Super stable and all around great.

customer_reviews.title: Mavic Pro is Magical
customer_reviews.text: I flew a P3S for several months but was not satisfied with the flight dynamics nor the camera quality. Mavic Pro makes the P3S look like a toy. The flight controls, dynamics and 4K camera are, as it’s name implies, professional. The P4P may have a better camera, and longer flight times but dollar for dollar you cannot beat a MP. Check out a portion of a video I shot on the MP. By the way, this was my third flight with the craft.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t hesitate, buy it now.
customer_reviews.text: This product is top of the line as far as drones go, it can do it all. The 4K video is stunningly detailed, pictures are fantastic, and ease of flight is unbelievable. There are several different flight modes to suit all your needs. It’ll fly fast(up to 41 mph), slow and is incredibly easy to fly with GPS signal. I would definitely reccomend. It comes packaged and looks like it’s brand new. Don’t hesitate, buy it now.

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to fly

The box contained everything a new drone would come with, including 3 different cables to use on the remote control. No cons that I can think of, only had it for 3 days now.
